name: ezfile
description: EZFile - W-2 Tax Filing Assistant for Single Filers. Reads your W-2, calculates your complete Form 1040 (or 1040-SR for seniors), and generates a line-by-line filing guide for Free File Fillable Forms.
author: EZFile Contributors

skills.name: file-taxes
skills.description: Upload a W-2 (PDF/image) and calculate your complete federal tax return

skills.name: add-1098e
skills.description: Add student loan interest deduction from Form 1098-E

skills.name: calculate
skills.description: Calculate (or recalculate) the full Form 1040 line by line

skills.name: review
skills.description: Display your completed return summary for review

skills.name: explain
skills.description: Explain any tax concept, W-2 box, or 1040 line in plain English

skills.name: checklist
skills.description: Step-by-step guide to file your return at freefilefillableforms.com
